pr_title: Fixed issue #1580 Participant Manager - PATCH /users/{userId} - check authUserId is not empty before calling any APIs on Auth Scim Service

timeline.bodyText:
why does this replace the need to check the userStatus?
Please add a test to verify that everything is working as expected.
timeline.author: zohrehj

replies.bodyText: Use Status validation is already implemented at Line 225 so we don't need to check the status again. We are setting User Account Status based on the request in Line 257.
replies.author: dhanyak-btc

replies.bodyText: Test cases shouldDeactivateUserAccount() and shouldReactivateUserAccount() is available in UserProfileControllerTest class
replies.author: harisboston
